column5: This great condo has all of the luxury appointments. Close to downtown Austin, golf, tennis, restaurants, Lake Travis and hill country. Maximum 8 adults (over 18 years of age) due to city ordinance.  Sleeps up to 11 people comfortably.  Lake Travis is minutes away.  Nearby Lakeway Marina on Lake Travis (5 minutes) to rent boats, jet skis and launch boat.
